title: Master Thesis - Characterization of Piezoelectric Micromachined Ultrasonic Transducers (pMUTs) for Medical Imaging (f/m/d)
field: Acoustic Engineering, Acoustics, Biomedical Engineering, Biomedicine, Electrical Engineering, and 4 moreImage Processing,Mechanical Engineering,Medical Imaging,Signal Processing
job_description: YOUR FUTURE RESPONSIBILITIESThis thesis will focus on the characterization of pMUTs for next-generation biomedical imaging applications (e.g., Intravascular ultrasound [1]).The main tasks includepackaging of pMUT samples,electrical and mechanical characterization,acoustic characterization, andmedical imaging experiments.The outcome of the thesis will contribute to optimizing the pMUT design.[1] https://silicon-austria-labs.com/forschung/project-calls/phased-pmut-array-for-intravascular-ultrasound-imaging/.YOUR PROFILETop master student with study or research background in MEMS, ultrasound, signal processing, or other related fields.Interested in the ultrasonic transducers, MEMS characterization, medical imaging.Knowledge of characterizing MEMS sensors or ultrasonic transducers, signal processing algorithms.Experience with medical signal processing would be preferred.Experience with design or characterization of interface electronics for ultrasonic transducers would be preferred.Good oral and written English skills.IMPORTANT FACTS ABOUT SALStart of Employment: Immediately.Limited position: Duration 6 months.This position is endowed with a gross annual salary of â¬ 1.545.- / month, based on the collective agreement for research (âForschungs-Kollektivvertragâ).Home Office possible.â¬ 4.- /day food allowance in restaurants / â¬ 2.- /day in supermarkets.Free Coffee/Milk/Tea.
